data.title: A Long Decision Yields A Holy Owner
data.meta_description: Since 1939, the legacy of Edmund S. Long can be seen in the family's continued ownership of a Class B AM and its FM translator, and a full-power TV station serving much of the Charlotte DMA. Thanks to Kalil & Co., which served as the exclusive broker in the transaction, the Long family has decided to part ways with its TV operation.
data.text:
Since 1939, the legacy of Edmund S. Long can be seen in the familyâ€™s continued ownership of a Class B AM and its FM translator, and an independent full-power television station covering 22 counties encompassing the Charlotte television market.

Thanks to Kalil & Co., which served as the exclusive broker in the transaction, Long Communications LLC has decided to part ways with its TV operation.
